Title: The Inner Reaches of Outer Space.
Subtitle: Metaphor as Myth and as Religion.
Authors: Joseph Campbell.

Description: Created from a powerful set of lectures delivered by the "father of modern mythology," this exciting book--the second in the series Collected Works of Joseph Campbell--suggests that laws of physics that govern the universe are also at play within the human consciousness..
